news.title: Time to spread butter again? Study questions historic advice
news.summary: For several decades the fats associated with butter and cheese have been on a list of substances to consume in moderation. This original advice is not evidence based, according to a new study.

news.title: Dietary recommendations on fat intake based on limited evidence

news.title: We should never have told people to stop eating fat
news.summary: After being maligned for decades for its caloric density and heart-clogging effects, fat's place in our diet is being reconsidered — and a new study argues that there wasn't enough evidence to curb our consumption of butter and cheese in the first place. R

news.title: We should never have told people to stop eating fat
news.summary: After being maligned for decades for its caloric density and heart-clogging effects, fat's place in our diet is being reconsidered -- and a new study argues that there wasn't enough evidence to curb our consumption of butter and cheese in the first place.

facebook.title: The evidence base for fat guidelines: a balanced diet
facebook.summary:
There has been much in the media today (& previously) about the low-fat diet and the health advice given in the 1980s and since. This review, which informed the story, was published in the Open Heart journal.
http://openheart.bmj.com/content/2/1/e000229.fu
